data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of La Altagracia unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of La Altagracia, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in La Altagracia, Dominican Republic.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of La Altagracia, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of La Altagracia.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Japanese people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, may the churches in La Altagracia, Dominican Republic honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in La Altagracia, Dominican Republic today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.section_summary:
the state of La Altagracia, Dominican Republic has a population of 182,000.

We estimate La Altagracia has 19,727 people who might know Jesus, 150,975 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 11,297 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 19,727 believers in La Altagracia to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.

location.name: La Altagracia
location.cities_list: Salvaleón de Higüey, Punta Cana, San Germán, Hormigueros, Cabo Rojo
